awards.text: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 6 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: A reporter Mullen 'stumbles' on a story linking a prominent Member of Parliament to a KGB agent. In fact it is also linked to a near Nuclear disaster involving a teenage runaway and an Americal USAF base. Has there been a Government cover-up,Mullen teams up with Vernon Bayliss, an old hack, and Nina Beckam the MP's assistant to find out the truth.
plot: After a newspaper reporter helps expose a Member of Parliament as a possible spy, he finds that there's much more to the story than that.
title: Defense of the Realm
